channel.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
channel.description:
i get an error message i need help with it
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SSi2.txt does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\boxbreaker.txt does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\RedXIIsFordCracker.txt does not exist. Failed when compiling
solemn wishes.... preferably u can help me?

hmm lets see, from WHERE?!!??!?!?

item.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“woodsie, post:9, topic:137509”]ok i put the SRL in my includes now i got diff error message, wowz SCAR rlly sucks at working

Failed when compiling
Line 47: [Error] (72:9): Unknown identifier ‘BitmapFromString2’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL/SRL/Core/Globals.scar[/quote]

Download SCAR 3.11.

item.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

some are txt some are scar.

For that you need SRL, which is the most up to date and only still working include, For SRL 4 go to this link, once again, You’ll need to extract to, in your case, C:\Program Files\Scar 3.06\includes\

http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/showthread.php?t=17095
^You need to register at SRL for that to work

Read full topic
item.source: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!

item.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
item.dc:creator: @woodsie woodsie
item.description:
@woodsie wrote:

ive got SCAR 3.06… anyways i got all the includes but… are they supposed to be text docs or SCAR docs with the little digger on? i put em in my includes and thats when i got the second errror 1 sec ill get it

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL\misc\VarrockWestColorFinder.scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling

Read full topic

@Nashi wrote:

Download em into %PutYourScarDirectoryHere(Eg. C:\Program Files\Scar 3.11%\includes\

item.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

SCAR Includes... 2007-07-07 | Cleanup

I’ve decided to remove all of the current includes from SCAR’s include system because they are all outdated. That way there’s more room for new includes. However, all old includes will still be downloadable at http://freddy1990.com/oldincludes.

Read full topic

item.title: Varrok essence miner version 3.1.1 by solemn wishes help!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I don’t think solemn wishes visits these forums much anymore(If you are reading this - prove me wrong).

But i think you need to go to File> and click “download includes”.

Then try the script again. If it stills gives you the same error then i’m sorry i cannot help you.

Read full topic
